name: B.A.N.D.I.T
description:
Its 2006. You are in a place called The Swamp. 2 nuclear explosions have happened in the past 10 years. Those who couldn't get away in time have been mutated. There are people that wander around there called Bandits, they scavange the place for money and abandoned stuff, your job is to find out what caused the nuclear blasts. Goodluck on your journey

Early acces is out. Give some opinions!
